results.name: Denominator of A047994(n)/n where A047994 is the unitary totient function.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
formula: a(n) = n / A323409(n) = n / gcd(n, A047994(n)). - _Antti Karttunen_, Jan 11 2020
